MajorClaims.MC2: I agree with the idea of studying a lone

Claims.C1: it helps me to concentrate more, and it helps me to build my personality
Claims.C2: it helps me to focus more and establish my personality
Claims.C3: Studying alone helps us to focus more in our lessons
Claims.C4: we are building our personalities when we study alone

Premises.P1: I am a type of person who cannot comprehend my subjects unless I am alone
Premises.P2: I can prepare my schedules, guidelines, exercises and go over them all
Premises.P3: we have a lot of subjects which require us to sit and study alone such as math, reading, and drawing
Premises.P4: I can take advantage of every minute without wasting by studying alone
Premises.P5: answering our homework alone encourages us to be more responsible and independent
Premises.P6: it motivates us to be accurate in our work in the future
Premises.P7: when I fix my study plan with a specific time and finish it on time, it improves my ability in the future to become more precise and careful
